name: Lucky Game
description:
'Lucky Game' is a funny game to play with your friends. Enter a name, gender and age to test your or your friends lucky in the future!

It is recommended to only play the game if you are 16 or older, there are some sex-oriented predictions.

Notes:

- Allow the game to use notifications your browser, with the notifactions you can enter the questions.

- We promise we do nothing with the information you fill in, although it is not very personal (only name, gender and age.)

- It may sound obvious but remember this game is just for fun and the predictions are really not accurate...

Updates:

Lucky Game 1.1

- Added a favicon.

- You can now only have children if you are 18 year old or older.

- A minor change.

Lucky Game 1.0

- This is the first verison of the game.
